summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; authorizing the execution of License Agreements with SESAC, Inc., and the American Society of Composers, authors and Publishers ("ASCAP"), permitting the presentation of concerts of musical compositions of composers represented by SESAC, Inc. or ASCAP, increasing an Object of Expenditure in the 1979 Budget of the Seattle Center Department for the annual License Fees, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
